name: Kubernetes Deployment 最小
description: apps/v1 Deployment の最小マニフェスト

files.template:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{name}}
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: {{name}}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: {{name}}
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: app
          image: {{image}}
          ports:
            - containerPort: 80
